meaningMnemonic: If a <radical>tsunami</radical> gets into a <radical>net</radical> that's im<radical>prison</radical>ing a bunch of <radical>insect</radical>s, the insects are going to get all <kanji>muddy</kanji>. The net gets dragged along with the tsunami water and the insects can't escape, so they just get covered in the yucky stuff.
readingMnemonic: Unfortunately for the insects, these <kanji>muddy</kanji> conditions have created the perfect habitat for <reading>duck</reading>s (だく). And muddy insects already imprisoned in a muddy net is a duck's favorite treat!
